  LayoutView at (0,0) size 800x600
layer at (0,0) size 800x600

        LayoutText {#text} at (0,0) size 397x18

      LayoutBlockFlow {DIV} at (0,68) size 784x36 [color=#008000]
        LayoutInline {<pseudo:first-letter>} at (0,0) size 10x18 [color=#0000FF]
          LayoutTextFragment (anonymous) at (0,0) size 10x18
            text run at (0,0) width 10: "T"
        LayoutTextFragment {#text} at (9,0) size 770x36
          text run at (9,0) width 761: "he first letter of this paragraph should be larger than the rest. If you hover over this paragraph, all of the text (including"
          text run at (0,18) width 539: "the first letter) should turn green. If the first letter remains black, then there is a bug!"
